name: Yusuf Ali
text: Ta-Ha.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: We have not sent down the Qur'an to thee to be (an occasion) for thy distress,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: But only as an admonition to those who fear (Allah),-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: A revelation from Him Who created the earth and the heavens on high.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (Allah) Most Gracious is firmly established on the throne (of authority).

name: Yusuf Ali
text: To Him belongs what is in the heavens and on earth, and all between them, and all beneath the soil.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: If thou pronounce the word aloud, (it is no matter): for verily He knoweth what is secret and what is yet more hidden.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Allah! there is no god but He! To Him belong the most Beautiful Names.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Has the story of Moses reached thee?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Behold, he saw a fire: So he said to his family, "Tarry ye; I perceive a fire; perhaps I can bring you some burning brand therefrom, or find some guidance at the fire."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: But when he came to the fire, a voice was heard: "O Moses!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Verily I am thy Lord! therefore (in My presence) put off thy shoes: thou art in the sacred valley Tuwa.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "I have chosen thee: listen, then, to the inspiration (sent to thee).

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Verily, I am Allah: There is no god but I: So serve thou Me (only), and establish regular prayer for celebrating My praise.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Verily the Hour is coming - My design is to keep it hidden - for every soul to receive its reward by the measure of its Endeavour.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Therefore let not such as believe not therein but follow their own lusts, divert thee therefrom, lest thou perish!"..

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "And what is that in the right hand, O Moses?"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: He said, "It is my rod: on it I lean; with it I beat down fodder for my flocks; and in it I find other uses."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (Allah) said, "Throw it, O Moses!"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: He threw it, and behold! It was a snake, active in motion.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (Allah) said, "Seize it, and fear not: We shall return it at once to its former condition"..

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Now draw thy hand close to thy side: It shall come forth white (and shining), without harm (or stain),- as another Sign,-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "In order that We may show thee (two) of our Greater Signs.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Go thou to Pharaoh, for he has indeed transgressed all bounds."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (Moses) said: "O my Lord! expand me my breast;

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Ease my task for me;

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "And remove the impediment from my speech,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "So they may understand what I say:

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "And give me a Minister from my family,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Aaron, my brother;

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Add to my strength through him,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "And make him share my task:

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "That we may celebrate Thy praise without stint,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "And remember Thee without stint:

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "For Thou art He that (ever) regardeth us."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (Allah) said: "Granted is thy prayer, O Moses!"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "And indeed We conferred a favour on thee another time (before).

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Behold! We sent to thy mother, by inspiration, the message:

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "'Throw (the child) into the chest, and throw (the chest) into the river: the river will cast him up on the bank, and he will be taken up by one who is an enemy to Me and an enemy to him': But I cast (the garment of) love over thee from Me: and (this) in order that thou mayest be reared under Mine eye.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Behold! thy sister goeth forth and saith, 'shall I show you one who will nurse and rear the (child)?' So We brought thee back to thy mother, that her eye might be cooled and she should not grieve. Then thou didst slay a man, but We saved thee from trouble, and We tried thee in various ways. Then didst thou tarry a number of years with the people of Midian. Then didst thou come hither as ordained, O Moses!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "And I have prepared thee for Myself (for service)"..

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Go, thou and thy brother, with My Signs, and slacken not, either of you, in keeping Me in remembrance.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Go, both of you, to Pharaoh, for he has indeed transgressed all bounds;

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "But speak to him mildly; perchance he may take warning or fear (Allah)."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: They (Moses and Aaron) said: "Our Lord! We fear lest he hasten with insolence against us, or lest he transgress all bounds."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: He said: "Fear not: for I am with you: I hear and see (everything).

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "So go ye both to him, and say, 'Verily we are messengers sent by thy Lord: Send forth, therefore, the Children of Israel with us, and afflict them not: with a Sign, indeed, have we come from thy Lord! and peace to all who follow guidance!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "'Verily it has been revealed to us that the Penalty (awaits) those who reject and turn away.'"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (When this message was delivered), (Pharaoh) said: "Who, then, O Moses, is the Lord of you two?"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: He said: "Our Lord is He Who gave to each (created) thing its form and nature, and further, gave (it) guidance."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (Pharaoh) said: "What then is the condition of previous generations?"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: He replied: "The knowledge of that is with my Lord, duly recorded: my Lord never errs, nor forgets,-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "He Who has, made for you the earth like a carpet spread out; has enabled you to go about therein by roads (and channels); and has sent down water from the sky." With it have We produced diverse pairs of plants each separate from the others.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Eat (for yourselves) and pasture your cattle: verily, in this are Signs for men endued with understanding.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: From the (earth) did We create you, and into it shall We return you, and from it shall We bring you out once again.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And We showed Pharaoh all Our Signs, but he did reject and refuse.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: He said: "Hast thou come to drive us out of our land with thy magic, O Moses?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "But we can surely produce magic to match thine! So make a tryst between us and thee, which we shall not fail to keep - neither we nor thou - in a place where both shall have even chances."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Moses said: "Your tryst is the Day of the Festival, and let the people be assembled when the sun is well up."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: So Pharaoh withdrew: He concerted his plan, and then came (back).

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Moses said to him: Woe to you! Forge not ye a lie against Allah, lest He destroy you (at once) utterly by chastisement: the forger must suffer frustration!"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: So they disputed, one with another, over their affair, but they kept their talk secret.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: They said: "These two are certainly (expert) magicians: their object is to drive you out from your land with their magic, and to do away with your most cherished institutions.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Therefore concert your plan, and then assemble in (serried) ranks: He wins (all along) today who gains the upper hand."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: They said: "O Moses! whether wilt thou that thou throw (first) or that we be the first to throw?"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: He said, "Nay, throw ye first!" Then behold their ropes and their rods-so it seemed to him on account of their magic - began to be in lively motion!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: So Moses conceived in his mind a (sort of) fear.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: We said: "Fear not! for thou hast indeed the upper hand:

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Throw that which is in thy right hand: Quickly will it swallow up that which they have faked what they have faked is but a magician's trick: and the magician thrives not, (no matter) where he goes."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: So the magicians were thrown down to prostration: they said, "We believe in the Lord of Aaron and Moses".

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (Pharaoh) said: "Believe ye in Him before I give you permission? Surely this must be your leader, who has taught you magic! be sure I will cut off your hands and feet on opposite sides, and I will have you crucified on trunks of palm-trees: so shall ye know for certain, which of us can give the more severe and the more lasting punishment!"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: They said: "Never shall we regard thee as more than the Clear Signs that have come to us, or than Him Who created us! so decree whatever thou desirest to decree: for thou canst only decree (touching) the life of this world.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "For us, we have believed in our Lord: may He forgive us our faults, and the magic to which thou didst compel us: for Allah is Best and Most Abiding."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Verily he who comes to his Lord as a sinner (at Judgment),- for him is Hell: therein shall he neither die nor live.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: But such as come to Him as Believers who have worked righteous deeds,- for them are ranks exalted,-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Gardens of Eternity, beneath which flow rivers: they will dwell therein for aye: such is the reward of those who purify themselves (from evil).

name: Yusuf Ali
text: We sent an inspiration to Moses: "Travel by night with My servants, and strike a dry path for them through the sea, without fear of being overtaken (by Pharaoh) and without (any other) fear."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Then Pharaoh pursued them with his forces, but the waters completely overwhelmed them and covered them up.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Pharaoh led his people astray instead of leading them aright.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: O ye Children of Israel! We delivered you from your enemy, and We made a Covenant with you on the right side of Mount (Sinai), and We sent down to you Manna and quails:

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (Saying): "Eat of the good things We have provided for your sustenance, but commit no excess therein, lest My Wrath should justly descend on you: and those on whom descends My Wrath do perish indeed!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "But, without doubt, I am (also) He that forgives again and again, to those who repent, believe, and do right, who,- in fine, are ready to receive true guidance."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (When Moses was up on the Mount, Allah said:) "What made thee hasten in advance of thy people, O Moses?"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: He replied: "Behold, they are close on my footsteps: I hastened to thee, O my Lord, to please thee."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (Allah) said: "We have tested thy people in thy absence: the Samiri has led them astray."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: So Moses returned to his people in a state of indignation and sorrow. He said: "O my people! did not your Lord make a handsome promise to you? Did then the promise seem to you long (in coming)? Or did ye desire that Wrath should descend from your Lord on you, and so ye broke your promise to me?"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: They said: "We broke not the promise to thee, as far as lay in our power: but we were made to carry the weight of the ornaments of the (whole) people, and we threw them (into the fire), and that was what the Samiri suggested.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Then he brought out (of the fire) before the (people) the image of a calf: It seemed to low: so they said: This is your god, and the god of Moses, but (Moses) has forgotten!"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Could they not see that it could not return them a word (for answer), and that it had no power either to harm them or to do them good?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Aaron had already, before this said to them: "O my people! ye are being tested in this: for verily your Lord is (Allah) Most Gracious; so follow me and obey my command."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: They had said: "We will not abandon this cult, but we will devote ourselves to it until Moses returns to us."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (Moses) said: "O Aaron! what kept thee back, when thou sawest them going wrong,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "From following me? Didst thou then disobey my order?"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (Aaron) replied: "O son of my mother! Seize (me) not by my beard nor by (the hair of) my head! Truly I feared lest thou shouldst say, 'Thou has caused a division among the children of Israel, and thou didst not respect my word!'"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (Moses) said: "What then is thy case, O Samiri?"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: He replied: "I saw what they saw not: so I took a handful (of dust) from the footprint of the Messenger, and threw it (into the calf): thus did my soul suggest to me."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (Moses) said: "Get thee gone! but thy (punishment) in this life will be that thou wilt say, 'touch me not'; and moreover (for a future penalty) thou hast a promise that will not fail: Now look at thy god, of whom thou hast become a devoted worshipper: We will certainly (melt) it in a blazing fire and scatter it broadcast in the sea!"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: But the god of you all is the One Allah: there is no god but He: all things He comprehends in His knowledge.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Thus do We relate to thee some stories of what happened before: for We have sent thee a Message from Our own Presence.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: If any do turn away therefrom, verily they will bear a burden on the Day of judgment;

name: Yusuf Ali
text: They will abide in this (state): and grievous will the burden be to them on that Day,-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: The Day when the Trumpet will be sounded: that Day, We shall gather the sinful, blear-eyed (with terror).

name: Yusuf Ali
text: In whispers will they consult each other: "Yet tarried not longer than ten (Days);

name: Yusuf Ali
text: We know best what they will say, when their leader most eminent in conduct will say: "Ye tarried not longer than a day!"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: They ask thee concerning the Mountains: say, "My Lord will uproot them and scatter them as dust;

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "He will leave them as plains smooth and level;

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Nothing crooked or curved wilt thou see in their place."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: On that Day will they follow the Caller (straight): no crookedness (can they show) him: all sounds shall humble themselves in the Presence of (Allah) Most Gracious: nothing shalt thou hear but the tramp of their feet (as they march).

name: Yusuf Ali
text: On that Day shall no intercession avail except for those for whom permission has been granted by (Allah) Most Gracious and whose word is acceptable to Him.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: He knows what (appears to His creatures as) before or after or behind them: but they shall not compass it with their knowledge.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (All) faces shall be humbled before (Him) - the Living, the Self-Subsisting, Eternal: hopeless indeed will be the man that carries iniquity (on his back).

name: Yusuf Ali
text: But he who works deeds of righteousness, and has faith, will have no fear of harm nor of any curtailment (of what is his due).

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Thus have We sent this down - an arabic Qur'an - and explained therein in detail some of the warnings, in order that they may fear Allah, or that it may cause their remembrance (of Him).

name: Yusuf Ali
text: High above all is Allah, the King, the Truth! Be not in haste with the Qur'an before its revelation to thee is completed, but say, "O my Lord! advance me in knowledge."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: We had already, beforehand, taken the covenant of Adam, but he forgot: and We found on his part no firm resolve.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: When We said to the angels, "Prostrate yourselves to Adam", they prostrated themselves, but not Iblis: he refused.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Then We said: "O Adam! verily, this is an enemy to thee and thy wife: so let him not get you both out of the Garden, so that thou art landed in misery.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "There is therein (enough provision) for thee not to go hungry nor to go naked,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Nor to suffer from thirst, nor from the sun's heat."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: But Satan whispered evil to him: he said, "O Adam! shall I lead thee to the Tree of Eternity and to a kingdom that never decays?"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: In the result, they both ate of the tree, and so their nakedness appeared to them: they began to sew together, for their covering, leaves from the Garden: thus did Adam disobey his Lord, and allow himself to be seduced.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: But his Lord chose him (for His Grace): He turned to him, and gave him Guidance.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: He said: "Get ye down, both of you,- all together, from the Garden, with enmity one to another: but if, as is sure, there comes to you Guidance from Me, whosoever follows My Guidance, will not lose his way, nor fall into misery.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "But whosoever turns away from My Message, verily for him is a life narrowed down, and We shall raise him up blind on the Day of Judgment."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: He will say: "O my Lord! why hast Thou raised me up blind, while I had sight (before)?"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (Allah) will say: "Thus didst Thou, when Our Signs came unto thee, disregard them: so wilt thou, this day, be disregarded."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And thus do We recompense him who transgresses beyond bounds and believes not in the Signs of his Lord: and the Penalty of the Hereafter is far more grievous and more enduring.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Is it not a warning to such men (to call to mind) how many generations before them We destroyed, in whose haunts they (now) move? Verily, in this are Signs for men endued with understanding.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Had it not been for a Word that went forth before from thy Lord, (their punishment) must necessarily have come; but there is a Term appointed (for respite).

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Therefore be patient with what they say, and celebrate (constantly) the praises of thy Lord, before the rising of the sun, and before its setting; yea, celebrate them for part of the hours of the night, and at the sides of the day: that thou mayest have (spiritual) joy.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Nor strain thine eyes in longing for the things We have given for enjoyment to parties of them, the splendour of the life of this world, through which We test them: but the provision of thy Lord is better and more enduring.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Enjoin prayer on thy people, and be constant therein. We ask thee not to provide sustenance: We provide it for thee. But the (fruit of) the Hereafter is for righteousness.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: They say: "Why does he not bring us a sign from his Lord?" Has not a Clear Sign come to them of all that was in the former Books of revelation?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And if We had inflicted on them a penalty before this, they would have said: "Our Lord! If only Thou hadst sent us a messenger, we should certainly have followed Thy Signs before we were humbled and put to shame."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Say: "Each one (of us) is waiting: wait ye, therefore, and soon shall ye know who it is that is on the straight and even way, and who it is that has received Guidance."
